isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - INTERNATIONAL 530E I6 HEUI ENGINES - OPERATION - Air Temperature Sensor (ATS)

svcproc.title: Air Temperature Sensor (ATS)
svcproc.para: The ambient Air Temperature Sensor (ATS) is a thermistor type sensor that has a variable resistance which changes when exposed to different temperatures. The CEC measures the signal from the sensor and uses the data to adjust timing and fuel rate to limit smoke emissions in cold weather starting.

The CEC module connector (379) sends a regulated 5 volt reference signal through circuit 97AX to the Air Temperature Sensor (463). As the temperature changes, the sensor changes resistance and provides the CEC with an air temperature signal voltage. The sensor is grounded through circuit 97BU/97BW to the CEC signal ground.
